list_definition.definition: a male ruler of a nation, who inherits his position by right of birth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He became king when his father died

list_definition.definition: the playing card with the picture of a king

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have two cards – the ten of spades and the king of diamonds.

list_definition.mean_english: quân tướng; vua trong bàn cờ
list_definition.definition: the most important piece in chess.
